docs.name: Autowidth
docs.description: The Autowidth Powerfield directive automatically adjusts a text input's width to its content.

properties.name: @Input() powExtraWidth: number
properties.description: Extra space added to the input's width (in pixel).

properties.name: @Input() powMaxWidth: number
properties.description: Maximum size of the input (in pixel). If maximum size is 0, it is ignored.

properties.name: @Input() powMinWidth: number
properties.description: Minimum size of the input (in pixel). If minimum size is 0, it is ignored.
